synopsis.text: Yuugaâ€™s curiosity leads him to test the Slave Control Method (SCM), a device that enslaves people wearing it, following a game of chance. When he crosses paths with the sharp-witted Eiya, they form an unlikely alliance. As they delve deeper into the dark world of SCM, they encounter ruthless players driven by greed, deception, and power, all vying to become the ultimate master. With the stakes high and lives at risk, Eiya finds herself in a dangerous game, where one wrong move could lead to enslavement or worse. As the pair navigates this treacherous world, they uncover hidden agendas and face challenges that will push them to their limits. Will they emerge victorious or become pawns in this twisted game of power?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
